alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 10:50AM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek at Walnut Grove. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Agricultural land and low areas along and near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 24.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 25.5 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 24.6 Thu 10 am CS 25.5 25.3 24.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM CST.
